survey_brief: This survey assesses employee readiness and perceptions regarding the integration of AI tools in the workplace.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with AI-powered tools in the workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for familiarity assessment. Ensure options are clear and unambiguous.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with AI-powered tools in the workplace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following AI tools have you used in your current role? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse tool usage.

script.question_text: Which of the following AI tools have you used in your current role? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What concerns, if any, do you have about AI integration in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative insights. Provide a text box for detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text question with a large input field.

script.question_text: What concerns, if any, do you have about AI integration in your workplace?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to adopt AI tools if provided with adequate training?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure adoption likelihood.

script.question_text: How likely are you to adopt AI tools if provided with adequate training?

questions.question_text: Which department do you work in?
questions.client_notes: Categorize responses by department for cross-analysis.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice question with radio buttons and an 'Other' option.

script.question_text: Which department do you work in?

questions.question_text: How often do you currently use AI tools in your daily tasks?
questions.client_notes: Assess frequency of current AI tool usage.

script.question_text: How often do you currently use AI tools in your daily tasks?

questions.question_text: What benefits do you foresee from AI integration in your role?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture perceived benefits.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text question with a large input field.

script.question_text: What benefits do you foresee from AI integration in your role?

questions.question_text: Rate your confidence in using AI tools without assistance.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for confidence assessment.

script.question_text: Rate your confidence in using AI tools without assistance.

questions.question_text: Which of the following training formats would you prefer for learning about AI tools? (Select up to 2)
questions.client_notes: Limit selections to 2 to prioritize preferences.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice question with checkboxes and a selection limit.

script.question_text: Which of the following training formats would you prefer for learning about AI tools? (Select up to 2)

questions.question_text: How would you rate your organization's current support for AI tool adoption?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to measure perceived organizational support.

script.question_text: How would you rate your organization's current support for AI tool adoption?

questions.question_text: What barriers do you anticipate in adopting AI tools? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify common barriers.

script.question_text: What barriers do you anticipate in adopting AI tools? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How important is AI integration for your organization's future success?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to gauge perceived importance.

script.question_text: How important is AI integration for your organization's future success?
